bug.author: abhinavsp0730
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(S) with issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/federated/blob/master/docs/federated_core.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/federated/blob/master/docs/federated_core.md</denchmark-link>
In the above readme file <denchmark-link:https://research.google/pubs/pub62.pdf/>MapsReduce</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Pull Request</denchmark-h>
I've corrected the link and by successfully merging <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/federated/pull/813>#813</denchmark-link> it'll resolve this issue. Hey, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mihaimaruseac>@mihaimaruseac</denchmark-link> Kindly review it.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/abhinavsp0730>@abhinavsp0730</denchmark-link> As mentioned by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MarkDaoust>@MarkDaoust</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/37783#issuecomment-602776176>here</denchmark-link> , please mention the following in the description of the PR fixes: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/37807 which closes this issue automatically when the corresponding PR gets merged. Thanks!
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/abhinavsp0730>@abhinavsp0730</denchmark-link> I see this issue of broken link was corrected already. Can you verify once and close the issue? thanks!

Hey, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jvishnuvardhan>@jvishnuvardhan</denchmark-link> I've linked a PR with this issue, Even though it's merged successfully but don't know why this issue hasn't been closed automatically. Would please give me some insight in this. Nevertheless closing this issue.
